mainHero.title: Let we find a
mainHero.subtitle: Charging Station.
mainHero.description: Our mission is to make charging electric cars easier, cheaper, and more accessible to everyone. Join us and help accelerate the transition to sustainable transportation.

secondaryAction.href: mailto:ozancanakn@gmail.com?subject=I like to join as a host!

items.title: Mobile App for Drivers
items.description: Find affordable charging options near you. Pay half the price compared to regular charging stations and discover the freedom to choose any road you wish to travel.

items.title: Web App for Hosts!
items.description: As a host, offer your place as a charging station and earn money. Make more than your electricity bill by just plugging in a car. Help expand the charging network to places it's never reached before.

features.title: Smart Charging with Advanced Features
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!

items.name: Book Charging Times
items.description: Never worry about charging station availability. Make reservations ahead of time, just reach the location at your booked slot, plug in, and relax.

items.name: Make It Cheaper
items.description: Make your car fully charged in half price

items.name: Vision of Charge
items.description: Show all charging stations near you.

items.name: Pay Pre-defined Prices
items.description: When you show stations on map you can see prices.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
